H0.text: Where in the west country can you find a branch of the Tate Gallery. Penzance

H1.text: Where in the west country can you find a branch of the Tate Gallery. Falmouth

H2.text: Where in the west country can you find a branch of the Tate Gallery. Truro

H3.text: Where in the west country can you find a branch of the Tate Gallery. St.Ives

A4.text: Tate St Ives is an art gallery in St Ives, Cornwall, England

A5.text: The Tate St Ives was built between 1988 and 1993 on the site of an old gasworks and looks over Porthmeor beach.
